original_text: There on the mountain that you have climbed you will die and be gathered to your people, just as your brother Aaron died on Mount Hor and was gathered to his people.
korean_text: 네 형 아론이 호르 산에서 죽어 그의 조상에게로 돌아간 것 같이 너도 올라가는 이 산에서 죽어 네 조상에게로 돌아가리니

sentences.original_text: There on the mountain that you have climbed
and be gathered to your people
just as your brother Aaron died
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 형제 아론이 죽은 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: and was gathered to his people
